m_szDocTitle: Mercedes plans fuel cell powered GLC for 2017
m_szDocSumamry: Mercedes plans fuel cell powered GLC for 2017 February 4, 2016 | In: Mercedes-Benz Leave a Comment Thomas Weber, head of research and development at Mercedes, says his company will introduce a production fuel cell powered vehicle in 2017.
